Most women have their ‘booking 
appointment’ with a midwife between 
the 8th and 12th 
week of pregnancy. 
This can take a 
couple of hours.
You will also be 
offered	an	ultrasound	
scan	to	confirm	you	
are pregnant and 
The time from when you find out you are pregnant until you have your baby is the 
antenatal period and during this time you will receive your care from the most appropriate 
person for your pregnancy.
As soon as you know you are pregnant, you should get in touch with y
